et.title: エストニア語
et.audioFor: All audio is in Japanese. Work is in progress to include JMAudio.
et.exampleSentencesFor: In example sentences the Japanese version is explained and has the audio.

en.title: 英語
en.description: Interface behavior similar to Estonian mode.

ja.title: 日本語
ja.objective: The objective is to offer some value to Japanese speakers by inversion of existing datasources.
ja.dictDirection: Dictionary is working in Estonian-Japanese direction. Based on active inversion at runtime.
ja.audioFor: Estonian words have the audio. Work is in progress to computer-generate pronunciations using EKI's TTS synthesizer.
ja.exampleSentencesFor: Example sentences are in Estonian. There is no translation at the moment. Based on TEKSaurus. Ideally there should be natural audio for example sentences.

rtkForm.tip1: Heisig ID search works only with numbers. Supported ID range is 1-2200.
rtkForm.tip2: Keyword can either be in English or Estonian. 900 keywords have been translated to Estonian.
rtkForm.tip3: ID search uses RTK's 6. edition by default.
rtkForm.tip4: Primitives are the ones used in RTK. These differ from the radicals used in Japan.
